column2: Gearhead
This person has a mind of metal, enchancing their brain.
Clockheart
This person has a heart of iron, enhancing their health.
Ironjaw
This person has a jaw of metal, enhancing their speech.
Heavyhand
This person has arms of iron, increasing their strength.
Ironfoot
This person has legs of metal, increasing their speed.
Steameye
This person has steam-powered eyes, enhancing their vision.
enhanced
inhuman
The new steam technology can be used to augment and enhance your body. Would you like to purchase an augmentation?
Buy a gearhead, enhancing your mind.
Buy a clockheart, enhancing your endurance and health.
Buy an ironjaw, enhancing your speech.
More...
More options...
Buy a heavyhand, increasing your strength.
Buy an ironfoot, increasing your speed.
Buy a steameye, increasing your vision.
Nevermind.
Your mind feels sharper than ever before.
Now I know all!
You can feel your new heart ticking away.
I could run for days!
Your speech is clearer than it's ever been.
My tongue is as smooth as silver, errr... iron!
You can feel the power coursing through your arm.
None will withstand my might!
You can feel the power coursing through your legs.
None will outpace me!
You can see things you never could before.
Now nothing can hide from me!
The discovery of Steam
Your researchers have discovered that using steam you can power mechanical wonders.
What mysteries will we uncover now?
The English Steam
An English ambassador comes before you, offering a technology of great military power in exchange for using it to weaken Spain.
At last Portugal will rise!
Buy Augmentation
You can buy a steam-powered augmentation as long as you can afford it and are healthy enough for the operation.
Righteous Britannian Empire
Righteous Britannian
Righteous Emperor
The Discovery of Steam
King Edward of England has discovered that superheated water can be used to produce power. This steam could have many potential applications.
The Anglo-Saxon Reply
Following William of Normandy's failed invasion, Godwinson replied in kind. Using his new steam weapons the English easily conquered Normandy. Can they be stopped?
O Reino das Sombras

The English have provided Portugal weapons in order to defeat the common enemy in Spain. A secretive organization calling itself the Realm of Shadows quickly sprung on the opportunity, taking the technology for itself and rising to power. What plans do they have for the world?
Augmentation Laws
Status of steam augments in the realm.
Augments banned
Banned
Augments are banned in the realm, any person found to be using them must surrender them - willingly or not.
Augments permitted
Allowed
Augments are allowed in the realm, anybody can use them.
Banned my augment
Banned augments
Allowed my augment
Allowed augments
Augments are illegal in your realm, and word has gotten to your liege that you might have a couple of augmentations.
I'll craft a disguise to hide my augmentations!
I'll flee the realm!
I have no choice but to face the law...
Your disguise is successful, your liege doesn't notice anything strange.
I'll have to lie low for a while...
Your disguise fails, your liege sees your augments!
Damn it!
Having been found guilty of possessing augments, your liege orders their immediate removal.
I hope this doesn't hurt too much...
The procedure is a success, but leaves behind a bloody wound.
That could've been worse...
While the augment was successfully removed, the procedure leaves you horribly maimed.
Why me?!
